articles.title: reAlpha (Nasdaq: AIRE) Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire InstaMortgage
articles.mainIdea: reAlpha (Nasdaq: AIRE) Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire InstaMortgage
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: reAlpha (Nasdaq: AIRE) Signs Definitive Agreement to Acquire InstaMortgage. Proposed acquisition will add direct mortgage lending capabilities to complement the Company’s existing mortgage brokerage operations Expected to close in the first half of 2026 following regulatory approval DUBLIN, Ohio, Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- reAlpha Tech Corp. (Nasdaq: AIRE) (the “Company” or “reAlpha”), an AI-powered real estate technology company, today announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire InstaMortgage Inc. (“InstaMortgage”), an independent mortga Related tickers mentioned: AIRE.

articles.title: Why One Fund Added $4.2 Million to Park Hotels Even Though the Stock Has Slid 27%
articles.mainIdea: Why One Fund Added $4.2 Million to Park Hotels Even Though the Stock Has Slid 27%
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Why One Fund Added $4.2 Million to Park Hotels Even Though the Stock Has Slid 27%. With travel demand wobbling and hotel margins under pressure, this move hints at a very specific bet on cash flow durability rather than near-term headlines. Related tickers mentioned: NVDA, PK.

articles.title: Bridge City Capital Loads Up Onto Innovation Stock With Over 31,000 Shares

articles.summary: Motley Fool: Bridge City Capital Loads Up Onto Innovation Stock With Over 31,000 Shares. Post-trade holding: 47,342 shares valued at approximately $6.12 million. Related tickers mentioned: ENSG, GBCI, ONTO, STRL.
